objects.specification: A smooth seamless concrete floor with a natural earthy warm tone finish that evokes a woodland palette, providing a durable and non-reflective surface suitable for classroom use.
Standard interior classroom wall with a smooth drywall surface, painted in a neutral earthy tone to complement the dinosaur theme, featuring crisp right angles and minimal texture.
Standard interior classroom wall with a smooth drywall surface, painted in a neutral earthy tone to complement the dinosaur theme, featuring crisp right angles and minimal texture.

A large sturdy teacher’s desk crafted from polished dark wood with subtle dinosaur-themed engravings along the edges, featuring a broad rectangular top surface and robust tapered legs that convey both functionality and thematic cohesion.

A large wall-mounted hybrid blackboard/whiteboard panel with a matte dark surface framed by natural wood, featuring subtle dinosaur silhouette accents along the border for a playful yet educational visual emphasis.

A large circular analog wall clock with a dinosaur motif at its center, featuring bold easy-to-read markings, a smooth natural wood frame, and decorative dinosaur footprints around the perimeter to reinforce the theme.
A modern low-profile cylindrical LED ceiling light fixture with a diffused frosted glass shade and warm white illumination, designed to provide even bright lighting across the classroom.

A museum-style wall-mounted display case with a sleek metal frame, clear tempered glass front, internal shelving to showcase dinosaur models and fossils, and subtle spot lighting inside to highlight each exhibit.

A life-sized articulated dinosaur skeleton exhibit with realistic bone textures mounted on a metal armature, showcasing an upright posture, intricate vertebrae details, and accurate paleontological structure.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple evenly spaced shelves, filled with a variety of dinosaur-related books and educational materials, crafted from warm-toned wood to match the classroom’s earthy palette.
A large rectangular classroom window with transparent glass panels and slim metal frames, designed to admit abundant natural light and offer unobstructed outdoor views.
Soft fabric curtains in a light beige tone with subtle texture, designed to gently drape on either side of the window and add a warm, natural accent.
